title: A Stroll Through the Dream Garden

textboxes.description: You find yourself in a vast, surreal garden filled with glowing plants, softly humming flowers, and a sky that shifts between colors with each step you take. You don’t remember how you got here, but it all feels oddly peaceful.

choices.text: Smell one of the strange, shimmering flowers
Walk down a path lined with iridescent stones

textboxes.description: The flower has a soft, nostalgic scent, bringing memories of places you've never been. You feel a deep connection to the garden, almost as if it’s alive. One of the flowers seems to be watching you closely, curious and inviting.

As you walk down the path, the stones seem to glow under your feet. They hum softly, creating a tune that shifts with your movements. You feel like you’re being led somewhere. The path splits into two directions: one lined with silver, the other with golden leaves.

choices.text: Take the path with silver leaves
Take the path with golden leaves

textboxes.description: You speak softly to the flower, and it responds in a melodic voice, asking if you seek wisdom or companionship. Its petals sway gently, waiting for your answer.

You gently pick the flower, feeling its warmth in your hand. It hums a little tune before quieting, leaving you with a sense of calm. The world around you shimmers, and a path of stars appears, leading you onward.
The path of silver leaves brings you to a pond with water so clear you can see galaxies reflected in it. You feel as if you could step into it and swim among the stars.

choices.text: Take a gentle dip in the pond

textboxes.description: The golden path leads you to a towering tree covered in glowing fruits. They sway slightly, as though beckoning to be plucked.

choices.text: Climb up to see the view from the top

textboxes.description: The flower whispers advice on life, love, and a reminder to water plants more often. The knowledge is soothing, leaving you feeling wiser.
The flower hums a warm tune, and you feel a gentle presence by your side. It stays with you as you walk further through the dream, providing comfort and cheer.
Following the path of stars, you arrive at a clearing where the air is filled with twinkling lights. You feel weightless, as though you could drift away into the sky.

choices.text: Lie down and gaze at the stars

textboxes.description: You dip into the pond and feel yourself surrounded by stars. For a moment, you float through constellations, connected to the universe. When you resurface, you feel rejuvenated.
Staring into the pond, you see flashes of forgotten memories and hidden knowledge. The images are comforting and inspiring.
You pick a fruit and wipe it clean, marveling at its radiant colors. As you hold it, it fills you with warmth and light.
Climbing to the top, you see the dream garden stretching endlessly. The sky is filled with a thousand colors, and the view is breathtaking.
You float up, becoming one with the stars. Everything around you sparkles, and you feel at peace. Slowly, you drift back to the garden, feeling a profound sense of joy.

end.description: As you continue to walk through the dream garden, the colors slowly fade. You feel a gentle pull back to reality, bringing with you a sense of calm, joy, and perhaps even a new insight.
